service_short_description: Eco-friendly door-to-door waste pickup for households.
service_details: Our residential waste collection service ensures timely, hygienic, and eco-friendly pickup of daily household garbage. With flexible weekly or monthly plans, EcoBin takes full responsibility for keeping your home environment clean and waste-free.

service_short_description: Custom waste solutions for businesses and offices.
service_details: EcoBin provides scalable and reliable waste management solutions for businesses including shops, restaurants, corporate offices, and malls. We offer scheduled pickups, and recycling support tailored to your business needs.

service_short_description: Safe disposal of medical and biohazard waste.
service_details: EcoBin follows strict protocols for the safe handling and disposal of medical and pharmaceutical waste. We serve hospitals, clinics, and labs, ensuring sterilized, and disposed of responsibly.

service_short_description: Efficient disposal of construction and demolition debris.
service_details: EcoBin manages waste from construction and demolition sites including bricks, concrete, wood, and metal. We offer both regular and mutual benefit plans for timely, safe, and sustainable project waste disposal.

service_short_description: Professional land filling with optional material supply.
service_details: EcoBin provides efficient landfilling services using soil, rubble, and other fill materials. Book in advance to enjoy special rates under our mutual benefit plan, with optional material supply.

service_short_description: Heavy-duty waste collection for factories and production sites.
service_details: Our industrial waste services support factories, warehouses, and plants with safe collection, handling, and disposal of all waste types. We handle materials using eco-safe practices and scalable plans.
